name: Magic Run (Sergio-Al)
description:
Overview

Save the world, your home the hope of your people is upon you.

Magic Run is a fun infinite runner that provides the player thousands of hours of diversion with our game system, battles and much more.

UPDATE Bugs Fixed version Here

Play

Extract and execute
MagicRun/WindowsNoEditor/ColorSpeedGame.exe

Controls
  • P: Pause Game
  • A - D: Change Direction
  • Space: Jump
  • Right Mouse Button / Two fingers Magic TrackPad: Select Spell
  • Left Mouse Button, touch Magic Trackpad: Cast Spell
Credits

Environment Assets pack from: Dreamscape Nature: Meadows Stylized Open World Environment

Characters From: Mixamo

Members ProgrammerSergio Alejandro Machaca Lamas3D ArtistArturo Garcia Achacollo SoundFX and MusicAnatoly Mijail Baltazar Aguilar Engine

Developed in Unreal Engine 4
